alert.note: Alert for Clark; Comanche; Ford; Gray; Kiowa; Meade; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 2:42AM CDT until April 23 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Ford County in southwestern Kansas... Eastern Seward County in southwestern Kansas... Kiowa County in south central Kansas... Meade County in southwestern Kansas... Western Comanche County in south central Kansas... Southern Gray County in southwestern Kansas... Clark County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 241 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near The Haggard Elev to 9 miles southeast of Hayne, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... The Haggard Elev around 245 AM CDT. Ensign around 250 AM CDT. Meade State Park around 300 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Ford, Englewood, Acres, Ashland and Sitka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Comanche; Ford; Gray; Kiowa; Meade; Seward
